reviewtext: I purchased one pack of these to support my effort to finally get all my cords organized. I wished I had more, though I accomplished a lot with just the one pack because I was able to bundle multiple cord sets together. This is a very basic tool, just like the Velcro wraps that come on most computer power cords, though a bit shorter. I can't remember what I paid, but I remember imagining that they could have been less expensive. That said, I understand that Velcro is a pretty expensive product for those who manufacture products using it, my cost resistance could have been unrealistic. I do like that they were different widths, and that there were some very thin ones for smaller cords.
